name: Extreme Noise Terror
description: '''Extreme Noise Terror''' (often abbreviated to '''ENT''') are a British [[extreme metal]] band formed in [[Ipswich]], England in 1985 and one of the earliest and most influential [[Crust punk|crust]] bands. Noted for one of the earliest uses of dual vocalists in hardcore, and for recording a number of sessions for [[BBC Radio 1]] DJ [[John Peel]], the band started as crust punks and helped characterise the early, archetypal [[grindcore]] sound with highly [[Politics|political]] lyrics, fast guitars and [[tempos]], and often very short songs.
